basics.name: Hau Tran
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Hey, I am Hau Tran, a frontend developer passionate about web development. I enjoy creating things that live on the internet from start to finish and take great care in the experience, and code quality of the things I build. Outside of programming, I enjoy doing photography and traveling.

projects.name: Arc
projects.summary: An e-commerce marketplace web application where people come together to make, sell, buy, and collect unique items
projects.technologies: TypeScript, TanStack Query, Nuxt.js, Pinia, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, MongoDB

projects.name: Meepo
projects.summary: A free social networking site where people converse with each other in short messages
projects.technologies: TypeScript, TanStack Query, Vue, Tailwind CSS, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Redis

projects.name: Camille
projects.summary: A note-taking web application where you can think, write, and plan
projects.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Tanstack Query, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, MySQL, Stripe

highlights: Develop user-facing features and reusable code, ensuring UI/UX designs are feasible and optimized for performance and scalability
Collaborate with BAs, POs, designers, and back-end developers to align on requirements and implementation
Write unit tests for quality assurance.
Maintain, debug, and support project releases in production
